newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatia c.bank sells HRK22.5 mln bills, rates flat.
newsitem.headline: Croatia c.bank sells HRK22.5 mln bills, rates flat.

text.p: Rates were steady and volume dipped to only 22.5 million kuna on Wednesday, Croatia's central bank said after its weekly auction.
The 91-day rate was unchanged at 9.0 percent as the bank accepted all bids totalling 6.0 million kuna.
It sold 16.5 million worth of 35-day bills at a steady 7.50 percent rate.
The banks still stayed out of the longest term, 182-day bills, last issued at 17.50 percent in 1996. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
